Features:

* New! Advanced real-time protection against spyware, viruses, worms, bots, Trojans, theft of passwords and more.
* New! Improved system for the removal of rootkits.
* New! Database of detection extended to more than 1.2 million online threats.
* New! A substantial reduction in the use of computer memory
* Control of web browsing with Host File Editor
* Scanners customizable.
* Compatible with Windows Vista (32 and 64 bit)
* Automatic Updates faster and more efficient
* Free technical support
* New! Integrated antivirus protection - powerful protection against spyware, trojans, worms, viruses and malware, all in a single, simple application.
* Ad-Watch Real-Time Monitor - Detects applications with malware and spyware before it installs on your PC and attack your personal information.
* Advanced Code Sequence Identificaction (CSI) Technology - Ensure the protection of your privacy with an accurate detection of malware including Trojans, worms, spyware and other forms of malware misleading.
* New! Improved system for removing rootkits - Technology to detect and remove rootkits to find hidden threats.
* New! Expanded threat detection - The new anti-virus detection Lavasoft includes more than a million viruses and malware threats, with continuous updates to keep your privacy to computer attacks.
* TrackSweep - Control your privacy by erasing all the tracks left after surfing the internet, for multiple browsers like Internet Explorer, Firefox and Opera with a single click.
* System Restore Point - Easily return to your clean system to recover from a spyware attack.
* Ad-Watch Regshield - Improved detection of attempted registry changes, the favorite target of many distributors of malware.
* Process Watch Module - View an in-depth picture of all processes under way and quickly to known criminals.
* Ad-Watch Process - immediately detects all the processes to prevent malicious recognized to be integrated into your system.
* Host File Editor - Take control of your Web navigation by blocking the sites from advertising, reversing the kidnapping of tickets for the browser, assisting with parental control and navigation shortcuts.
* New! Substantial reduction in the use of computer memory - significant reduction in resources while on surveillance mode (Watchguard).
* New! Quick updates - Protects against the latest forms of malware and spyware with a free software upgrade for the duration of the license. The new compression unloading cause product updates faster for users on all systems.
* New! Lavasoft ThreatWork - Submit suspicious files directly to their analysis, via ThreatWork, an alliance of global security against spyware that is actively working against cyber threats.
* Ad-Watch Connect - Open a new channel to identify keyloggers and attempted robbery with the relevant screenshots of programs connected to other networks.
* The Planner - automatic Scanners tailored to their personal tasks to optimize the time and resources.
* Scaners customizable - Save time by scanning the desired areas where known spyware programs are housed: RAM, registry, hard drive, external storage devices and optical disks.
* Easy installation and use - without the effort Handle the complexities of malware detection and removal of our user-friendly interface.
* Detailed report of the scanner - Exports reports of a scanner and gurada XML files as text files.
* Advanced command line support - Ecsanea and removes spyware without launching the interface of windows.
* Free Support - unlimited support from our technical and customer service, in the expert Lavasoft Support Center.
* New! Compatible with Windows Vista (32 and 64 bit)

System requirements:

* Processor: P600
* RAM: 100 MB + Operating System
* Hard Disk: 100 MB free space recommended
* Operating System: Windows Vista (32-and-64-bit), Windows XP (Home & Pro), Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 (Pro & Server)
* Browsers: Internet Explorer (version 5.5 or higher), Firefox (version 1.5 or newer), Opera (version 9 or higher)
